Name: Average time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' in the process
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average time between 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Minimun time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time it takes 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to be followed by any approval activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time it takes from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimun time until 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' is followed by 'Request Payment'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average waiting time to the 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' from the start of the process
Metric: The average of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases where re-submission occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time for 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' across different departments (grouped by org:resource)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and the end of case grouped by the last value of org:resource

Name: Total time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to the end of the process in successful claims
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and the end of case where activity 'Payment Handled occurs

Name: Minimun resolution time of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' in cases leading to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
